Module io.helidon.media.jsonp
Package io.helidon.media.jsonp

Class JsonpSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.media.jsonp.JsonpSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaSupport
    public final class JsonpSupport
extends Object
implements MediaSupport
    Support for JSON Processing integration. For usage examples navigate to MediaSupport.

      • streamWriterInstance

        public MessageBodyStreamWriter<javax.json.JsonStructure> streamWriterInstance()
        Return JSON-P stream writer.

        This stream writer supports publishers of JsonStructure (such as JsonObject), writing them as an array of JSONs.

        Returns:
        JSON processing stream writer.
